mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rank_like_ranking (recipe_no, recipe_nm, recipe_like_sum, rank_no, rank_ymd) SELECT re.recipe_no, re.recipe_nm, (SELECT COUNT(member_like_id) FROM rank_like WHERE recipe_no = re.recipe_no) AS recipe_like_sum, 0, now() FROM recipe re WHERE re.recipe_no IN (SELECT recipe_no FROM rank_like) ORDER BY recipe_like_sum DESC, recipe_no LIMIT 100
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rank_like_ranking WHERE rank_ymd = curdate()
SELECT recipe_no, rank_no FROM rank_like_ranking WHERE rank_ymd = curdate() ORDER BY recipe_like_sum DESC LIMIT 100

SELECT rk.recipe_no, rk.recipe_nm, rk.recipe_like_sum, rk.rank_no, rk.rank_ymd, re.recipe_complete_img FROM rank_like_ranking rk, recipe re WHERE rank_ymd = curdate() AND rk.recipe_no = re.recipe_no ORDER BY rk.recipe_like_sum DESC LIMIT 9 OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT rk.recipe_no, re.recipe_nm, count(rk.member_like_id) AS recipe_like_sum, rk.rank_ymd, re.recipe_complete_img FROM rank_like rk, recipe re WHERE rk.recipe_no = re.recipe_no AND rank_ymd BETWEEN (SELECT LAST_DAY(NOW() -INTERVAL 1 MONTH)+ INTERVAL 1 day FROM DUAL) AND (SELECT LAST_DAY(NOW())FROM DUAL) GROUP BY recipe_no ORDER BY recipe_like_sum DESC, recipe_no LIMIT 12

SELECT rk.recipe_no, re.recipe_nm, count(rk.member_like_id) AS recipe_like_sum, rk.rank_ymd, re.recipe_complete_img FROM rank_like rk, recipe re WHERE rk.recipe_no = re.recipe_no AND rank_ymd BETWEEN (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')) AND (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(curdate(), INTERVAL (6 - (WEEKDAY(curdate()))) DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')) GROUP BY recipe_no ORDER BY recipe_like_sum DESC, recipe_no LIMIT 12

SELECT rk.recipe_no, re.recipe_nm, count(rk.member_like_id) AS recipe_like_sum, rk.rank_ymd, re.recipe_complete_img FROM rank_like rk, recipe re WHERE rk.recipe_no = re.recipe_no AND rank_ymd = curdate() GROUP BY recipe_no ORDER BY recipe_like_sum DESC, recipe_no LIMIT 12
